item.title: Nvidia 加入印度深度技术联盟，该组织增加了新成员，并承诺出资 8.5 亿美元
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）周三加入了印度和美国投资者的行列，支持南亚国家的深度技术初创企业，该集团增加了新成员，并获得了超过 8.5 亿美元的资金承诺，以弥补巨大的资金缺口。【原文：Nvidia on Wednesday joined Indian and U.S. investors backing the south Asian country's deep-tech startups as the group added new members and secured more than $850 million in capital commitments to close a big funding gap.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，日产将因Nexperia事件而削减Rogue在日本的产量
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，由于荷兰 Nexperia 公司的芯片供应短缺，日产汽车将从下周起削减其在日本最畅销的 Rogue SUV 的产量，这是该芯片制造商外交风波的最新后果。【原文：Nissan Motor will cut production of its top-selling Rogue SUV in Japan from next week due to a short supply of chips from Dutch firm Nexperia, according to a person familiar with the matter, the latest fallout from the diplomatic turmoil involving the chipmaker.】

item.title: VIEW 亚洲市场震荡，人工智能涨势暂停，创七个月来最大跌幅
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市创下七个月来最大跌幅，科技股领跌，原因是投资者对人工智能推动的长期涨势踩了刹车。【原文：Equities saw their sharpest slide in seven months in Asia on Wednesday, with tech stocks leading losses as investors hit the brakes on a prolonged, artificial intelligence-driven rally.】

item.title: 市场大跌，美国原油库存增加，油价下跌
item.description: 周三，全球金融市场普遍下挫，凸显了人们对经济和燃料需求增长的担忧，美元走强和美国原油库存增加的报道加剧了人们的忧虑，油价随之下跌。【原文：Oil prices fell on Wednesday amid a broader selloff in global financial markets that underscored concerns about economic and fuel demand growth, with a stronger U.S. dollar and reports of rising U.S. crude stockpiles adding to the worries.】

item.title: 中国 10 月服务业采购经理人指数创三个月新低
item.description: 周三公布的一项民间调查显示，10 月份中国服务业活动有所增长，但增速为三个月来最慢，原因是海外订单减少抵消了国内需求改善带来的提振作用。【原文：China's services activity expanded in October but at its slowest pace in three months, as a decline in overseas orders offset the boost from improved domestic demand, a private survey released on Wednesday showed.】

item.title: 股市下挫，避险日元和美元大放异彩；新西兰元下滑
item.description: 周三，随着华尔街以科技股为首的大幅下挫蔓延至亚洲，避险货币日元和美元受到追捧。【原文：The safe-haven Japanese yen and U.S. dollar garnered demand on Wednesday as an aggressive tech-led selloff on Wall Street spilled over into Asia.】

item.title: 司法部称前全球工作组主席被控犯有证券欺诈罪
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，破产金融服务公司 GWG Holdings 前董事长、另类资产公司 Beneficent 创始人布拉德利-赫普纳（Bradley Heppner）因证券欺诈和电信欺诈等五项罪名被起诉。【原文：Bradley Heppner, the former chair of bankrupt financial services company GWG Holdings and founder of alternative asset firm Beneficent , was indicted on five charges including securities fraud and wire fraud, the U.S. Department of Justice said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 估值恐慌加剧，亚洲市场回调，华尔街受到冲击
item.description: 周三早盘，亚洲股市延续了华尔街隔夜的跌势，原因是投资者对估值过高的担忧削弱了信心。【原文：Asian stocks extended an overnight selloff on Wall Street in early trading on Wednesday as investor concerns about stretched valuations sapped confidence.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Perpetual 公司与贝恩资本就出售财富管理部门进行排他性谈判
item.description: 澳大利亚 Perpetual 公司周三表示，已与私人投资公司贝恩资本就出售其财富管理业务达成排他性协议。【原文：Australia's Perpetual said on Wednesday it had entered into an exclusivity deal with private investment firm Bain Capital for the sale of its wealth management business.】

item.title: 新汽车数据显示，特斯拉 10 月份英国汽车销量减半
item.description: 研究机构 New AutoMotive 周三发布的数据显示，特斯拉 10 月份在英国的汽车销量同比下降了一半，这与美国电动汽车制造商在其他欧洲国家的销量大幅下降形成了呼应。【原文：Tesla's UK car sales halved year-over-year in October, data from research group New AutoMotive showed on Wednesday, echoing the steep falls the U.S. electric vehicle maker saw in other European countries.】

item.title: 保险科技公司 Exzeo 在美国首次公开募股中融资 1.68 亿美元
item.description: 保险技术公司 Exzeo Group 周二在美国首次公开发行股票，募集资金 1.68 亿美元，股票定价在市场范围内，成为最新一家实施上市计划的保险公司。【原文：Insurance technology firm Exzeo Group raised $168 million in its U.S. initial public offering on Tuesday, pricing its shares within its marketed range and becoming the latest insurance company to proceed with its listing plans.】

item.title: 杰克-亨利第一季度利润因银行技术需求强劲而攀升
item.description: Jack Henry & Associates 周二公布，受银行技术服务需求回升的帮助，公司第一季度利润增长了约 21%。【原文：Jack Henry & Associates reported about a 21% jump in first-quarter profit on Tuesday, helped by resilient demand for its banking technology services.】

item.title: 澳大利亚青少年社交媒体禁令包括 Reddit 和 Kick
item.description: 澳大利亚互联网监管部门周三扩大了其全球首创的青少年社交媒体禁令，将 Reddit 和视频直播平台 Kick 包括在内，并表示如果更多网站的主要作用是实现在线社交互动，则可以将其纳入禁令范围。【原文：Australia's internet watchdog on Wednesday widened its world-first teen social media ban to include Reddit and video live streaming platform Kick, and said more sites could be added if their main role was to enable online social interaction.】

item.title: 移动芯片需求强劲 Skyworks 预测季度业绩乐观
item.description: Skyworks Solutions 周二预测第一季度营收和利润将高于华尔街预期，这表明苹果公司最新 5G iPhone 手机使用的射频芯片需求强劲。【原文：Skyworks Solutions forecast first-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, signaling robust demand for its radio-frequency chips used in Apple's latest 5G iPhones.】

item.title: 日本加密货币参与者争夺市场份额，寄希望于监管放松
item.description: 从在日本推出新产品和服务到促进杠杆交易投注，加密货币交易所和一些金融公司正急于利用投资者对数字资产日益高涨的热情套现，因为监管有望放宽。【原文：From the launch of new products and services in Japan to facilitating leveraged trading bets, crypto exchanges and some financial firms are rushing to cash in on rising investor enthusiasm for digital assets amid hopes of easing regulations.】

item.title: UPS 飞机在肯塔基州坠毁并喷出火球，至少三人丧生
item.description: 肯塔基州州长安迪-贝希尔（Andy Beshear）周二表示，UPS 的一架宽体货机在肯塔基州路易斯维尔坠毁，飞机起飞后不久即燃起大火，造成至少 3 人死亡，11 人受伤。【原文：At least three people were killed and 11 injured after a UPS wide-body cargo plane crashed in Louisville, Kentucky, erupting into a massive fireball shortly after takeoff, Kentucky Governor Andy Beshear said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西伊塔乌上调净利息收入预期，经常性利润与预期持平
item.description: 巴西贷款公司伊塔乌国民银行周二公布的第三季度经常性净利润符合分析师的预期，并与市场一起上调了对 2025 年净利息收入的预期。【原文：Brazilian lender Itau Unibanco on Tuesday reported third-quarter net recurring profit in line with analysts' estimates and raised its projection for 2025 net interest income with the market.】

item.title: 交易日：美国政治阴影下的震荡
item.description: 周二，华尔街遭遇了一场由科技股主导的大跌，美国顶级银行首席执行官发出的市场回调警告以及人工智能宠儿Palantir的急剧下滑使华尔街遭受重创，美元继续攀升，国债也吸引了一些避险需求。【原文：Wall Street succumbed to a tech-led selloff on Tuesday, slammed by warnings of a market pullback from top U.S. bank CEOs and a steep slide in AI darling Palantir, while the dollar continued its climb and Treasuries drew some safe-haven demand.】

item.title: 泰瑟枪制造商阿克森企业因关税问题利润不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 本周二，泰瑟枪制造商阿克森企业第三季度利润不及分析师预期，受关税实施导致成本上升的压力影响，其股价在盘后交易中暴跌20%。【原文：Taser-maker Axon Enterprise missed analysts' estimate for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, pressured by higher costs resulting from the implementation of tariffs, sending its shares slumping 20% in extended trading.】

item.title: CNH 工业公司将投资 50 亿美元用于美国生产和研发
item.description: 农用和建筑设备制造商 CNH Industrial 周二表示，将在五年内投资近 50 亿美元，用于在美国建立生产和研发设施。【原文：Farm and construction equipment maker CNH Industrial said on Tuesday it will invest nearly $5 billion over five years into manufacturing and research and development facilities in the United States.】

item.title: 自 10 月份开始征税以来，马特森已向中国支付了 640 万美元的港口费
item.description: 美国远洋运输公司 Matson 首席执行官马特-考克斯（Matt Cox）周二表示，自 10 月 14 日实施港口费以来，该公司已向中国支付了 640 万美元的港口费。【原文：U.S. ocean shipping company Matson has paid $6.4 million in port fees to China since they were implemented on October 14, CEO Matt Cox said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Entergy 与 Energy Transfer 签署长期天然气运输协议
item.description: 公用事业公司 Entergy 旗下部门与管道公司 Energy Transfer 周二表示，双方已签署一项为期 20 年的协议，向北路易斯安那州输送天然气。【原文：Utility Entergy's unit and pipeline firm Energy Transfer have signed a 20-year agreement to deliver natural gas to North Louisiana, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通回应关于公平使用银行服务的要求
item.description: 摩根大通在周二提交的一份监管文件中表示，它正在回应政府当局和其他各方就该银行有关所有美国人公平获得银行服务的政策和流程提出的要求。【原文：JPMorgan Chase said in a regulatory filing on Tuesday that it was responding to requests from government authorities and other parties regarding the bank's policies and processes related to fair access to banking to all Americans.】

item.title: 红杉资本首席执行官博塔卸任
item.description: Roelof Botha 在红杉资本任职三年多一点后，将辞去管理合伙人一职。【原文：Roelof Botha will step down as the managing partner at Sequoia Capital after a little more than three years in the role.】

item.title: 连锁餐厅卡瓦再次下调销售预期，原因是年轻食客减少
item.description: 地中海连锁餐厅卡瓦集团（Cava Group）周二今年第二次下调了年度同店销售增长预期，表明外出就餐需求疲软，尤其是低收入和年轻顾客的需求。【原文：Mediterranean restaurant chain Cava Group cut annual same-store sales growth forecast for the second time this year on Tuesday, signaling softer dining-out demand, especially from lower-income and younger customers.】

item.title: AMD 预计第四季度营收高于预期
item.description: 先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）周二预计第四季度营收将高于市场预期，该公司押注数据中心基础设施数十亿美元的扩张将促进对其人工智能芯片的需求。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices forecast fourth-quarter revenue above market estimates on Tuesday, betting on the multibillion-dollar expansions of data center infrastructure to boost demand for its artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 保险公司 AIG 第三季度利润因承保能力增强而上升
item.description: 美国国际集团周二报告称，该公司第三季度利润增长，原因是承保业务的强劲收益抵消了投资收入的下降。【原文：American International Group reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Tuesday, as the insurer was helped by strong gains from underwriting that offset a drop in income from investments.】

item.title: 凯德利尔第二季度收入因合同重新谈判而下降
item.description: Kyndryl 控股公司周二公布的第二季度收入略有下降，原因是该公司的前身 IBM 部门正在努力减少和重新谈判影响利润率的继承合同。【原文：Kyndryl Holdings reported a slight drop in second-quarter revenue on Tuesday, as the former IBM unit works to reduce and renegotiate inherited contracts that have hampered margins.】

item.title: 粉丝需求强劲，Live Nation 第三季度收入增加
item.description: 本周二，Ticketmaster 的母公司 Live Nation 公布第三季度收入增长，主要得益于音乐会和节庆活动的需求。【原文：Ticketmaster-parent Live Nation reported a rise in third-quarter revenue on Tuesday, helped by demand for concerts and festivals.】

item.title: 由于支付方持续下滑，Match 集团预计季度收入低于预期
item.description: 本周二，Match Group 预计第四季度营收低于分析师预期，这凸显了其扭亏为盈工作面临的持续挑战，因为 Tinder 母公司正努力将休闲刷卡者转化为忠实的付费用户。【原文：Match Group forecast fourth-quarter revenue below analysts' estimates on Tuesday, underscoring ongoing challenges in its turnaround efforts as the Tinder parent struggles to convert casual swipers into loyal, paying users.】
